div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #2C3E50;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#2C3E50, #adbccc); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
